p: A yeast two-hybrid assay was performed using the Matchmaker Gal4 Two-Hybrid System 3 (Takara Bio), according to the manufacturerâ€™s instructions. The RYSV M gene (GenBank accession no. NP_620499.1) was amplified and cloned into the bait vector pGBKT7 (pGBKT7-M), and different NcHig domains were cloned into the prey vector pGADT7 (pGADT7-Nc-CCP1, pGADT7-Nc-IG, pGADT7-Nc-CCP2, pGADT7-NcHig-full length). The recombinant vectors pGBKT7-M/pGADT7-Nc-CCP1, pGBKT7-M/pGADT7-Nc-IG, pGBKT7-M/pGADT7-Nc-CCP2, and pGBKT7-M/pGADT7-NcHig-full length as well as the positive control pGBKT7-53/pGADT7-T and the negative control pGBKT7-Lam/pGADT7-T were each co-transformed into the AH109 yeast strain, respectively. The segment containing the complement control protein (CCP) domain at the C-terminus (396-631 aa, CCP2) of R. dorsalis Hig (RdHig-CCP2) (GenBank accession no. MT043161) was cloned into the pGADT7 vector (pGADT7-RdHig-CCP2). The RSMV M gene (Gene ID: 41700835) was cloned into pGBKT7.
